author: Staff Reporter
text: A lone elephant attacked a woman, destroyed her hut and a two-wheeler near Sanaparai on Palani-Kodaikanal Ghat Road near here on Friday. On hearing the movement of the wild animal outside her house, N. Thamizharasi (27) of Sanaparai came out. Suddenly, the elephant attacked her. She received injuries in the hip, in her legs and shoulders. – Staff Reporter
title: Elephant attacks woman
